= camel get event

Get latest events of Camel integrations


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel get event [options]
----



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--filter` | Filter event by event type: context, route, or exchange |  | String
| `--sort` | Sort by pid, name or age | pid | String
| `--watch` | Execute periodically and showing output fullscreen |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
